content: David Chiang Office 179 Fitzpatrick Hall Mailing address Department of Computer Science and Engineering 384 Fitzpatrick Hall University of Notre Dame Notre Dame, IN 46556, USA E-mail dchiblaang@bla.nd.edu ORCID 0000-0002-0435-4864 Curriculum Vitae Publications David Chiang 蔣偉 Associate Professor, Computer Science and EngineeringNatural Language Processing Group My research is in natural language processing, the subfield of computer science that aims to enable computers to understand and produce human language. I focus mainly on language translation, and am interested in syntactic parsing and other areas as well.
